long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Overread is a web extension designed to streamline your content-saving experience on the Internet. Whether it's snippets of text, captivating images, or entire web pages, Overread empowers you to effortlessly preserve the online content that matters most to you.

Key Features:
🌟 Effortless Content Saving: With just a click, Overread allows you to save text, images, and entire web pages seamlessly.

🌈 Smart tags: Organise and search your content with smart tagging 

🔍 Intuitive Context Menu Integration: Right-click on any element to instantly add it to your collection, making content curation a breeze.

🔒 Secure and Trustworthy: Rest easy knowing that Overread only requests necessary permissions, prioritizing your privacy and security.

How to Use:

1. Install the Overread extension.
2. Register an account at https://access.overread.dev
3. Browse the web and find content you want to save.
4. Right-click on the content and select "Save to Overread" from the context menu.
Manage and organise your saved content in your Overread Dashboard at https://access.overread.dev


Note:
Overread is committed to safeguarding your privacy. We only request permissions essential for providing our services. Your data is never shared or sold to third parties. For more information, please refer to our Privacy Policy.

Have questions or suggestions? Contact our support team at hello.overread@gmail.com.

If you love using Overread, please consider leaving a review on the Chrome Web Store. Your feedback helps us continue to improve and enhance our services. Thank you for your support!
